about_the_game:
What Is Swimming Pool Cleaner ?

Swimming Pool Cleaner is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to become a one-person pool cleaning team. Take on rewarding tasks of cleaning pools and modifying them. Make them come to life and earn money while doing it!

Green to Clean!

Before you buy your first swimming pool you need to be able to afford it. Fortunately, your new job awaits! Take offers from your neighbours and clean their pools, pump out the dirty water, drain skimmers and change the filters. After the pool has been cleaned, modify it to make it beautiful, so that your clients are satisfied and pay you well. Make your dream of owning your own swimming pool come true!

With satisfaction!

Grab your sweeping brush and get ready to clean some swimming pools. Get rid of rotten leaves, branches and all the other trash. Fire up your power washer and blast away every speck of dirt and grime you can find, all with the simple satisfaction of power-washing to a sparkling finish.

Work smart !

Use your tools. Pressure cleaner, shovel and your reliable mop will do the trick. With their help no task will bring you down. Using them will help you gather neccesary experience and spread your wings, so that your job will become quicker and much more pleasant.

Have fun!

No matter if you plan to build a pool of your dreams or only splash in clean water, Swimming Pool Cleaner will help you ease your mind and relax. Take a seat, forget all your worries and take a dive inte the world of Swimming Pool Cleaner.

name: Swimming Pool Cleaner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIndows 11
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX3050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Swimming Pool Cleaner is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to become a one-person pool cleaning team. Take on rewarding tasks of cleaning pools and modifying them. Make them come to life and earn money while doing it!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish
*languages with full audio support
